data.Name: Emitwise
data.Tagline: Accelerating the change towards carbon neutrality
data.About:
Emitwise is a fast-growing start-up that uses machine learning to help large businesses monitor and manage their carbon footprint in real-time. Our mission is to help facilitate the global transition towards carbon neutrality. We need unique perspectives from diverse people to transform how companies around the world visualise, track and reduce their carbon emissions.

We believe the most impactful change to the way companies strategize in the near future, is going to come from their ability to easily understand the carbon cost of their past and future actions. Realising new technologies and integrations with a host of systems to make strategic decisions is what will drive companies to achieve a carbon neutral world.
